channel.title: Hugo on Stefan Neuhaus
channel.description: Recent content in Hugo on Stefan Neuhaus

item.title: Creating my website with Hugo
item.description: Why?? For some time I’ve had a strange need for a personal website, though I didn’t even know what content to share. The idea of having a blog felt a bit weird to me, as I was wondering for whom this might be meaningful. It took me a while, but meanwhile I think completely differently about this. You do not have to write long papers that meet academic requirements.
